coffeeDetials.name: Americanpo
coffeeDetials.description: Americano is made with hot water poured over espresso. Available in large,medium and small size
coffeeDetials.ingrdient: plain Coffee Americano and Hot Water

coffeeDetials.name: Mocha Latte
coffeeDetials.description: Made with espresso beans , steamed whole milk, chocolate syrup, and finished with whipped light cream and chocolate drizzle. Avialble in small,medium and large size
coffeeDetials.ingredient: Whole Milk,Espresso,Chocolate Drizzle,Chocolate Syrup,Whipped Light Cream,Water

coffeeDetials.name: French Vanilla Cappuccino
coffeeDetials.description: Made of whole steamed milk, bold espresso , fluffy foam, and rich French Vanilla flavor.Avialble in small,medium and large size

coffeeDetials.name: Caramel Macchiato
coffeeDetials.description: Made of dark-roast espresso served with steamed whole milk, mixed with sweet caramel syrup. Available in small, medium, and large

coffeeDetials.name: Premium Roast Coffee
coffeeDetials.description: Made with 100% Arabica beans,Premium Roast Coffee is  roasted and freshly brewed every 30 minutes.  Hot coffee black or with your choice of sugar, sweetener, and dairy or creamer. Available in small, medium, and large.

coffeeDetials.name: Iced Caramel Coffee
coffeeDetials.ingrident: Made of premium roast beans and buttery caramel flavor. sweetener and creamer for a taste of your choise.Available in small, medium, and large sizes.
